issues.description: The method findStockIngredient in the Stock class has a parameter mismatch. The problem statement's UML diagram specifies it with one parameter (String), and the solution implements it with one parameter (String name). However, the template implements it with two parameters (String name, boolean caseSensitive), which could confuse students as they might attempt to use the template's version directly, leading to compilation errors when trying to match the expected design.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the template's Stock.java to change the findStockIngredient method signature to match the problem statement and solution by removing the boolean caseSensitive parameter, ensuring students can implement the intended design without modification conflicts.
